00007 void ORJAMFADCDecoder::Swap(UInt_t* record)
00008 {
00009   for (size_t i=1;i<LengthOf(record);i++) {
00010     ORUtils::Swap(record[i]);

00014 std::string ORJAMFADCDecoder::GetHistName(int iHist)
00015 {
00016   int iCard = iHist % kNCards;
00017   int iCrate = (iHist - iCard) / kNCards;
00018 
00019   return ::Form("hJAMF_%d_%d", iCrate, iCard);
00020 }

00022 std::string ORJAMFADCDecoder::GetHistTitle(int iHist)
00023 {
00024   int iCard = iHist % kNCards;
00025   int iCrate = (iHist - iCard) / kNCards;
00026 
00027   return ::Form("JAMF: Crate %d, Card %d", iCrate, iCard);

00031 std::string ORJAMFADCDecoder::GetParName(size_t iPar)
00032 {
00033   switch(iPar) {
00034     case 0: return "crate";
00035     case 1: return "card";
00036     case 2: return "channel";
00037     case 3: return "adc";
00038     default:
00039       ORLog(kWarning) << "GetParName(): index (" << iPar
00040                       << ") out of range." << std::endl;
00041       return "unknown";
00042   }
00043 }
00044 
00045 UInt_t ORJAMFADCDecoder::GetPar(UInt_t* record, size_t iPar, size_t iRow)
00046 {
00047   switch(iPar) {
00048     case 0: return CrateOf(record);
00049     case 1: return CardOf(record);
00050     case 2: return IthChannelOf(record, iRow);
00051     case 3: return IthADCValueOf(record, iRow);
00052     default:
00053       ORLog(kWarning) << "GetPar(): index (" << iPar
00054                       << ") out of range." << std::endl;
00055       return 0;
00056   }
00057 }
